m_szDocTitle: G-20 Clean Energy, and Energy Efficiency Deployment and Policy Progress
m_szDocSumamry: Developed in co-operation with the G-20 Clean Energy and Energy Efficiency Working Group G-20 CLEAN ENERGY, AND ENERGY EFFICIENCY DEPLOYMENT AND POLICY PROGRESS 2011 Developed in co-operation with the G-20 Clean Energy and Energy Efficiency Working Group G-20 CLEAN ENERGY, AND ENERGY EFFICIENCY DEPLOYMENT AND POLICY PROGRESS The IEA would like to thank the Organisation of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC), the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA), and all participants in the G-20 C3E Working Group for their constructive review and comment of the earlier drafts of this report. T
